item.description:

item.title: Awful road surface, 16th August
item.description:
Woodlands Road Bexleyheath must have the worst road surface in Kent. A major cut through road right by a primary school. The surface of the road is dangerous for vehicles and pedestrians.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Woodlands Road, Welling, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: What is the mayor of Hackney doing about all these road closures due to works the mayor of Hackney needs to open alternative roads the ease the traffic flow. What is the mayor of Hackney doing about Chatsworth Rd, London new road ltn closure causing chaos on surrounding streets and even for the local homerton hospital ambulances struggling to get emergency patients to the hospital gridlock with traffic due to the mayor's ultra low street sign being enforced today hac01 The Chatsworth Road Liveable Neighbourhood scheme in Hackney, which includes improvements to make the area safer and more accessible, is scheduled to start on August 4, 2025, and is expected to take around four weeks to complete. This includes a fully pedestrianized Sunday market. The Hackney Council will monitor the scheme's impact for at least three years, with the first data set published by December 2025. The scheme involves changes like modal filters, pedestrian zones, and amendments to existing traffic restrictions. The Council has also worked with TfL and the London Ambulance Service on specific elements like a yellow box junction at Fenn Street., 16th August
item.description:
What is the mayor of Hackney doing about all these road closures due to works the mayor of Hackney needs to open alternative roads the ease the traffic flow. What is the mayor of Hackney doing about Chatsworth Rd, London new road ltn closure causing chaos

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Chatsworth Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Noisy/broken manhole cover, 16th August
item.description:
This manhole seems to have sunk lower over the last month and has become very noisy over the last few weeks. This road is frequently used at all hours of the day and the noise is very loud. Located in the west side of Newington Causeway, almost opposite the entrance of Metro Central Heights

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 119, Newington Causeway, Elephant and Castle, London
